# mIRC for VS Code

This extension adds support for the scripting language used by the IRC client [mIRC](http://www.mirc.com/). Features include:

* Syntax highlighting
* Snippets


## Installation

#### In client
1. Launch *Quick Open* in *VS Code*
    * `Ctrl+P` (Win, Linux)
    * `âŒ˜+P` (OSX)
2. Enter in the following command:
    * `ext install mirc`
3. Install the topmost extension

#### Manual

1. Download the latest .vsix release [here](https://github.com/lol2k/vscode-mirc/releases)
2. Follow [these instructions](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/extension-gallery#_install-from-a-vsix) to install the extension
